sentences.sContent: It affects tuberization, leaf senescence, and dormancy.
sentences.sContent_eng: It affects tuberization, leaf senescence, and dormancy.
sentences.sCn: 它影响块茎形成、叶子衰老和休眠。

sentences.sContent: When to repot, prune excess growth, take cuttings, or in any way physically disturb your plants is closely related to dormancy.
sentences.sContent_eng: When to repot, prune excess growth, take cuttings, or in any way physically disturb your plants is closely related to dormancy.
sentences.sCn: 换盆、修剪、砍头或其他任何物理上改变植物的行径都必须严肃地考虑到休眠的问题。

remMethod.val: dorm(睡眠) + ancy → 在睡眠状态 → 休眠状态

words.tran: 休眠的；静止的；睡眠状态的；隐匿的
